channel.title: Transport on DistributedFog
channel.description: Recent content in Transport on DistributedFog

item.title: GPS
item.description:
GPS provides geolocation and time information to a receiver anywhere on or near the Earth. It does not require the user to transmit any data, and it operates independently of any telephonic or internet reception. Wikipedia Research Stanford GPS Lab, Supply Chains, Indoor Navigation
Alternatives GLONASS is the most developed of the GPS alternatives, and is operated by Russia. Quora article on alternatives.
